title: The Snow - Part 2
description: ***PART 2 IN THE SEQUEL TO THE RAIN***  There's a body frozen in the snow. It seems like a sign of darker things to come. Somehow, the group presses on, despite the lack of food and fuel and warmth and anything hospitable in the white wastes of Colorado. Despite having a little less hope.  But Voley is acting funny too, and his hair is on end--what could have happened to this place? Find out in part 2 of The Snow.
author: Joseph A. Turkot
